amendment.description: To limit the use of funds for converting to contractor performance of Department of Defense activities and functions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1299 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1299 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S9563-9564; text: CR S9563-9564) To limit the use of funds for converting to contractor performance of Department of Defense activities and functions.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1299 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kennedy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1299 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
